transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello. 
Customer: Ah, Sushant ji Mishra ji baat kar rahe hain?
Executive: Haan, bataiye unhe.
Executive: Ah, Mishra ji, main IndiaMART head office se baat kar rahi hu, Sharma. Kaise hain aap?
Customer: Theek thaak hu madam. Shayad meri aapse pehle hi baat ho chuki hai.
Executive: Ah, sir, aapka obviously tickets open hoti hain toh uske regarding mere paas hi aata hai sir. Aur mera already aapse yeh cheez ko leke discussion ho bhi chuka hai sir ki aapka refund nahi ho sakta. Aap baar baar idhar ticket khol rahe hain, mujhe baar baar close karna padega sir. Aur baar baar aap kholenge koi uska solution nahi hai. Aapka maine management mein discuss bhi kiya tha. Maine unhone poocha tha agar yeh band kar rahe hain toh ek baar inse yeh bhi maango agar aapka GST aap mujhe waise aisi koi policy hai nahi sir. Phir bhi main agar 1% aapko support bhi karne ke liye bhi try karu toh sir mere paas kuch bhi proof nahi hai, right? Toh main usko aapka refund karne ke liye main aapka try kar hi nahi sakti try. Aur woh policies hi nahi hai toh kaise hoga sir? Aap keh rahe ho aapne business close kar diya hai, aap apna business usme run nahi kar rahe hain.
Customer: Close nahi kiya madam. Mera business close nahi hua hai. Mera business chal raha hai. Maine sirf itna kaha tha, aapse nahi baat hui. Meri aapke baad bhi do teen madam se baat hui thi. Maine unko yeh bola hua hai ki mere ko pehle dedh mahine try kiya. Maine leads ke liye try kiya. First toh mere matlab ki zyada leads thi nahi aur jo log baat bhi karte hain badi badtameezi se baat karte hain. Fir maine jab yeh dekha ki mera business nahi aaya toh maine partners se baat ki. Unka kehna hai bhai tune initiative liya hai IndiaMART se toh aap handle karo.
Customer: Jab mere ko lead mili nahi, kaam mila nahi, main kab tak chalata rahunga business?
Executive: Sir, kaam ab ek baat batao aap ek mahine, do mahine sir aap business start kiya aapne toh aapne kya ek saal se seedha aapne matlab expectation ROI ka kar liya tha kya ek mahine ke andar? Main yeh nahi keh raha hu.
Customer: Time laga hoga na cheezon ko setup hone mein. Main bol raha hu ki maine jo dedh mahine, do mahine try kiya lead, abhi toh teen mahine ho gaye. Teen, teen se mahine toh upar ho gaye. 
Executive: Sir, teen mahine ho gaye lekin last agar main ek mahine ki baat batau agar main chalo aapki baat upar rakh leti hu. Aapne sirf matlab month wise agar main baat karu aapne August mein buylead purchase kari hai bas jab aapne start kiya tha. 
Customer: August aur September mid tak humne try kiya. 
Executive: September mein aapne gin ke teen din use kari hain buylead. Main aapko chart bhej deti hu. Aap pura September ki jo baat kar rahe hain. 
Customer: Mere mere account mein hi hai. Maine simple unse yahi kaha tha aap check kar lo na sir agar hai toh. 
Customer: Maine unse yahi kaha tha ki first first toh maine jo lead li lead koi 100, 50, 100, 500. Jab main baat karta hu toh woh log aise baat karte hain jaise nahi maine bahut galti kar di phone karke unko. 
Executive: Sir dekho irrelevancy aapko jo yeh problem hai na ki agar agar aise koi irrelevancy aa rahi hai toh irrelevancy sir dekho aayega. Aap thoda sa apna bhi yeh cheez ko leke transparency main aapko leke chal rahi hu sir. Main aapko bol ke chal rahi hu aur aap thoda sa open bhi rahiye is cheez ke liye taaki maine aapki expectation setting bhi main aapki thodi si clear kar du sir ki irrelevancy toh aata hai kyunki yeh open platform hai sir. Hum kisi ko rok nahi sakte inquiry daalne se. Aap samajh rahe hain? Ab aapki dukan man lo. Ek minute sir meri puri baat sun lijiye. Mishra ji agar aap man lo koi dukan khol ke bhi baithe ho toh aapko agar din mein 10 customer aa raha hai toh 10 ka 10 aapse kaam lene nahi aata. Kai baar hota hai pata karke chale jata hai. Kai baar hota hai time pass kar raha hai. Dekh bhi nahi raha usko lena kuch aur hai woh kuch aur ke liye search kar raha hai. Toh yeh sab cheeze aayengi. Ab aap pata hai abhi kya kar rahe ho sir? To be very frank aapko teen mahine ho gaye hain jisme se do mahine aapne na aapne bina buylead consume kare apne barbaad kar diye. Aapko bhi pata hai sir refund ka koi solution nahi niklega, refund nahi hoga. Aap apna do mahina khud ke barbaad kar rahe ho. Isse acha sir lead toh lapse ho hi rahi hai. Aap side by side apna buylead toh consume karte raho. Buylead consume karo sir. Kaun sa bada customer kaha se takra jaaye yeh aapko bhi nahi pata Mishra ji. Waste aap pata hai kya hoga? Teen mahine aur waste kar doge. Fir aapko majburan cheh mahine baad services use karni padegi kyunki refund toh hoga nahi. Tab aap pachtaoge yaar main isse acha toh main tab bhi use kar leta. Maine do mahina bhi barbaad kar diya apna, teen mahina bhi barbaad kar diya buylead na consume karke. 
Customer: Toh aapke yaha aisa koi process hai ki main agar do teen mahine nahi run kar pa raha hu toh mera account suspend karke aap aage time badha denge se de do?
Executive: Sir, time nahi badhe ab aapne apne hand se hum abhi bhi aapko bol rahe hain sir ki aap buylead consume karo. Aap apna time. Nahi main kar raha hu. 
Customer: Bhai, main keh raha hu. 
Customer: Main business chala raha hu. Mujhe pata hai main deliver karne ki situation mein nahi hu. Mera bahut zyada pehle main sabse zyada dikat karta hu isliye nahi karna chahta. Man lo maine teen mahine chala ke teen mahine chala ke service nahi rakhi. Ab isko postpone karke aap January se utna time badha ke mere ko aage de dena.
Executive: Toh sir main sir aap kaisi baatein kar rahe hain na? Matlab aap ek businessman hoke aap matlab bura mat manna sir aap bilkul na bilkul opposite baat kar rahe ho. Aap keh rahe ho maine saal bhar ka services liya beech mein maine service. Koi baat nahi keh rahe hain. 
Customer: Haan toh sir time niklega na aap consume karo. Aapne buylead. 
Customer: Bhai consume toh tab karunga na jab woh bolega bhai deliver karo toh main deliver kaha se karunga batao? Toh aap tab tak. 
Customer: Main deliver nahi hu. Main jaanta hu main relation nahi kharab karna chahta. Chalo main aapka point samajh gayi hu. Aap mera plan extend kar do. Ya toh plan extend kar do aap. 
Executive: Aap kaisi baatein kar rahe ho? Kaise ho jayega plan extend batao? Aap unnecessary na sir woh cheeze jaan ke bol rahe ho jo cheez possible nahi hai. Aapne jab service activate kari thi usse pehle aapko nahi pata tha ki aap do teen mahine baad mein production deliver nahi kar paoge? 
Customer: Production ki koi cheez nahi pata thi. 
Customer: Madam nahi. Maine maine unse yeh bola tha mere ko monthly plan de do. 
Customer: Koi bhi dekho kisi bhi platform pe aadmi subscribe jayega na toh woh sure nahi hoga ki yeh platform mujhe de payega ki nahi de payega. Aapko main kaise bolunga ki aap mere ko de doge. 
Executive: Sir toh decision aapko lena hai. Koi bhi platform mein aap kaise bharosa karoge ki yeh platform aapko nahi dega. Aap kuch na kuch toh soch ke chaloge ki bhai ho sakta hai de paye, ho sakta hai na de paye. 
Executive: Bilkul sir toh humne aapko koi galat toh kiya nahi. Aap aap apni marzi se use nahi kar rahe na sir buylead. 
Customer: Mera toh dekhiye buylead buylead se maine buylead dedh mahina dekhi hai aise main bewakoof bol raha hu. Maine dekhi hai usko karke. Waha 100, 200, 500 baat karte hain toh maine kaha ki is wali madam se baat karte hain woh bhi. 
Executive: Toh sir main toh aapko abhi bhi bol rahi hu. Aap chahe use kariye mat kariye main toh aapko abhi bhi bol rahi hu ki sir irrelevancy aayega. Aap usko ek baar dhang se use karoge toh har tarah ka client aata hai. Aisa nahi hai ki sab kuch irrelevant. Agar aisi hota sir toh 30 saalon se number one company thodi na baithi hoti IndiaMART. 
Customer: Nahi nahi dekhiye number one ke liye log 65,000 wale lete hain, 1 lakh bhi lete hain. Aisa toh nahi company. 
Executive: Bilkul sir shuruwat toh 2,000 5,000 mein bhi uska chalta hai din mein. Hamara primary package hai. 
Executive: Hamare paas ₹100 wale, ₹50 wale, ₹150, ₹200 wale baat karte hain toh main aur uske baad mein. 
Executive: Jab aap ₹150 crore, ₹50 crore wali baat karoge sir toh aap agar. Nahi main crore wali baat nahi kar raha hu aap galat ja rahe ho. Main keh raha hu ki jo ₹150 ki cheeze maangte hain, ₹50 ki baat karte hain. Agar unse kaho bhai sahab itni toh meri cost bhi nahi hai toh woh galat tarike se language use karte hain baat karne mein. Ab aap batao ek aadmi ka keh so toh main 1200 handle karu. Yeh ek do baar ho gaya. 
Executive: Koi baat nahi sir toh aap unse mat karo na baat. Client toh aapko har tarike ka milega. Ab yahi client aapko offline mil jata toh aap kaise handle karte unko? 
Customer: Offline nahi. Aap business kar rahe ho sir. Nahi main business kar raha hu mujhe pata hai business kar raha hu. 
Executive: Aap har cheez apni. Aap business kar rahe ho tabhi main baat kar rahi hu. Aap suniye baat meri. Koi bhi feedback sabke liye itna toh mere liye mere platform mere ko lagta hai mere experience mein guzar raha sahi toh maine apni baat rakhi. Zaroori nahi sabka aisa experience is platform pe ho. Kisi ke paas bhai hazar variety hai sir ki. Mere paas jo hai mere ko nahi cheez mil rahi. Kisi ke paas jo variety usko mil rahi hai. 
Customer: Bhai mera feedback nahi hai ki mere ko nahi cheez lag raha toh maine kaha bhai mere ko nahi cheez lag raha mere ko refund chahiye. Maine apni baat rakhi. Ab aapka sabka chalna sabka chalna hoga yaar. Mere ko nahi chalna. 
Executive: Theek hai sir aapne apna point rakha, aapne apni baat bol di. Theek hai hum bhi toh apna point hi rakh rahe hain na sir. Hum bhi toh policies ke according hi chalenge na sir. 
Customer: Nahi nahi. Policy walsi main nahi jaanta. Dekho maine apni baat ki. Mere ko benefit nahi mila isliye maine kaha ₹65,000 mere hain jo bhi aapka chota mota sunta ho us hisab se credit karke aap refund wapas kar doge mere liye zyada achi hai. Main yahi keh raha hu aur kuch nahi keh raha. 
Customer: Bhai sabko sabko ek shop hoti hai woh har tarah product deti hai. Koi usme grahak aata hai bhaiya tumhara product mujhe mera nahi chala yeh wapas nahi karta aake. Aisa nahi har jagah generally yeh chalta hai. 
Executive: Sir aap jo nahi har din product aayega nahi aayega. 
Executive: Aap kya keh rahe ho ki aap teen mahine maine koi warranty di thi sir aap product line agar aap purchase karne ja rahe ho. 
Customer: Aap baat hi nahi hui aapko baat karni bekar hai. Aap se koi baat nahi hui. 
Executive: Theek hai sir bilkul meri aapse koi baat nahi hui hai lekin jab se aapne ke liye escalate kara hai sari cheeze toh meri main hi baat kar rahi hu. 
Customer: Jinhone mere dekho jinhone mere ko plan diya jinhone mere ko paisa mera le liya uske baad toh ab handle koi aur kar raha hai baat koi aur kar raha hai. 
Executive: Toh sir agar handle koi aur kar raha hai toh handle koi aur hi karega. Services toh hum hi denge na aapko toh hum hi handle karenge na sir. 
Customer: Nahi nahi handle sir maine ek baat batai. 
Executive: Dekho in short main aapko bata deti hu. 
Customer: Aap dekh rahe honge Amazon mein kabhi hum log product purchase karte hain unke refund policy. Aap kaise bolo sir aaram se fir aap meri sun lena taaki main aapko koi solution de pau agar aapko chahiye woh solution toh nahi chahiye toh koi baat nahi hai. 
Customer: Refund ki scheme aap Amazon mein product aap bhi yeh service de rahe ho product de rahe ho logon ko. Kisi ko product pasand aa raha hai uske liye raha. Kisi ko nahi pasand aa raha hai woh refund mang raha hai. 
Executive: Sir toh but mere paas obviously baat hai na main koi warranty wale pe leke thodi baithi hu ki ek saal aap use karo ya do ek mahina aap use karo, do mahina aap use karo agar nahi pasand aaye toh refund le lo. Maine toh koi aisi policy nahi banai IndiaMART mein. Toh maine jab aisi koi policy nahi banai toh main refund kyun du aapko? 
Executive: Bilkul sir meri product line hai. Mera koi service line mera product ke sath services hai. Aapko product pasand nahi aa raha hai toh hum aapko services. Dekho digital marketing service hoti hai. Service hum ek saal continue. 
Customer: Sir meri digital marketing nahi hai na sir. Mera product base hai. Mera nahi hai digital marketing. 
Customer: Main toh digital marketing hi karwa raha hu na aapse main jisse mere paas lead aaye. 
Executive: Sir aap kaisi baat kar rahe hain? Abhi maine product aapko becha uske badle main aapko leads de rahi hu. Irrelevancy bhi aayega aapko pata hai har tarah ka client aata hai. Aap business kar rahe ho market mein sir. Aapko yeh cheez pata hoga na. 
Customer: Main yeh dekho mere ko agar satisfaction nahi hai maine tab baat rakhi hai. Aur aisa nahi maine 15 din baad rakh di. Maine khud teen mahine baad rakhi hai. 
Executive: Bilkul sir aapne sab baat rakhi. Hum aapko agree kar rahe hain is cheez pe. Bahut achi baat hai sir aapne hume feedback diya. Hum bhi aapko sari baatein apni rakh ke bol rahe hain na sir. Aapko bhi pata hai ki aap bol rahe ho ki policy nahi hai hum de nahi sakte that's it. 
Customer: Bilkul sir hum de nahi sakte. Refund policy nahi hai sir hum refund nahi de sakte. Simple boli toh rahe hain aur kya bolu. 
Customer: Dekho aisa nahi hota jaisa aap bol rahe ho waisa hota nahi hai. Sir aap dekho hamari toh policy hai. 
Customer: Ab.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants a refund for subscription.

- Customer says leads are irrelevant and rude.

- Customer wants to postpone subscription and extend validity.



Resolution:

- Executive stated refund is not possible as per policy.

- Executive explained irrelevancy is part of open platform.

- Executive suggested to consume buyleads.

- Executive denied the request to postpone subscription.



Next Steps: 

- Issue not resolved.

- None.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, buyleads, subscription, irrelevancy
